website_summaries.verdict: This picnic table works well for very young children and can be folded for storage when not in use.
pros: Can unlock and fold for storage
Easy set-up that can be done without any additional tools
Can hold an umbrella, which does not come with this particular model
cons: The max weight on this table is only 50 pounds, which is significantly less than some others available

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy at all 1/2 star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with these two tables. I have bought Little Tykes for years & years. In all my years, never had I been so disappointed in their products. These tables lasted all but two weeks. They slant way over.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product alignment is poor. You can’t align table support beams into underside of the table. It was extremely difficult to assemble. I hope it holds weight as baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok...
customer_reviews.text: This table is cute but I don't like how flimsy the part is that holds the table up. The plastic underneath is already starting to collapse causing the table to lean sideways. My toddler has hardly used it and I'm always having to go under and adjust the plastic arm that allows the table to be folded up. And every time you adjust the arm piece that stabilizes it the plastic gets a little more sunken in. I personally wouldn't purchase this table again. I'd rather have one that's a bit more stable and doesn't fold down.
customer_reviews.author: ASweetTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY, BROKE AFTER 2 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: I RAISED 3 SONS AND HAVE 5 GRANDCHILDREN. I ALWAYS PREFER TYKES PRODUCTS. HOWEVER, THIS TABLE WAS NOT MADE WELL AND THE CONNECTORS SNAPPED OFF. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: ZOLL

customer_reviews.title: NOT "easy" to fold and store whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: While this little table appears to be sturdy, there is no way it should be called "Easy Store". Assembling it was anything but easy. I struggled to force the braces into position; finally got it done, half afraid the braces would snap on me. As can be seen in the photo, the brace damaged the edge of the slot in the process. Now it sits open in my living room, because it is far too hard to fold it up again, and I am afraid of breaking the braces. Otherwise, a decent piece of toddler furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sloho

customer_reviews.title: Supports don't hold for long
customer_reviews.text: Table support is kinda flimsy, if there were a way to fix them it would help. Ours started to lean after about 4 months with our toddler. The rest of the table is sturdy so fixing that one part would make a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia, Amazon Customer Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for toddlers. They can use to play on, color on, or eat at. Very versatile and perfect size for younger children up to 45 pounds. There is a larger version that takes up more room, but can last for a few more years. Highly recommend if you are looking for a great gift for the children and the parents, so useful and easy to set up and clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dignan

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd One!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables for toddlers! I bought one for my first child, my 2nd child used also. Then 10 years later had another child and bought one for him! Just bought this one for my grandchild!
customer_reviews.author: Shoes in GA

customer_reviews.title: A great little table
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of people saying theirs wouldn't snap together, or were warped etc, but the picnic table we received was perfect. My husband had to snap the legs in for me, but other than that, it went together fairly easily. It's the perfect size for small children and the V shape keeps it sturdy for little ones climbing in and out. We love it and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect much!
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality product! Very disappointed! If it's not snapped together exactly right the first time it won't stay together and it's a big waste of money!! Not sturdy even for small toddlers! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite play space
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very sturdy. This is just like the table my kids had when they were little. I bought this for the 1 year old grandchilds bday party and it has become his favorite place to sit and play when he comes to grandmas house.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly V ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for Christmas presents for year old 22 lb babies. I also bought one for my home when they visit. It was great for 2 1/2 Months then all of a sudden it rocks from side to side. I don't trust it with the babies anymore. It is going in the trash! I always thought Little Tykes was a good brand name but now I'm thinking not so much! Thumbs down on this table!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Like others I have had many Little Tikes products and not with grand-kids I was excited to purchase again! This table being an Amazon exclusive and made by Little Tikes was what I thought a "win-win". Not so! As others reviewed it was impossible to "slide" the bracket into the top to hold in place. NO WAY - believe what others said. No sure why this issue has still not been resolved but that it's it for me - no more Little Tikes!! Total waste of time -returning to Amazon ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Joyfull

customer_reviews.title: What we needed...
customer_reviews.text: ...when little ones visit. It is the perfect size for toddlers, since it is smaller than the regular one. It is especially nice for indoors, since it doesn't take up much room. However, it is not quite as sturdy as the regular-sized one. Don't let your little ones get on the table-top; it feels like it would crack. It was quite hard to click together, and if I hadn't had help, I most likely would have returned it. I do not feel it can be collapsed to put it away as the description states, so I am disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: It will work, for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a good table. In fact, It worked well for about 3 weeks. Then, it started slanting. I decided water must be doing it, so i drilled holes in the bottom of the legs to make sure water wasn't getting in... and it still slanted. I bought NEW black support pieces for under it, thinking maybe they sent the wrong size... it still slanted over. It's SUPER unsafe. It collapses. It needs to be redesigned. TERRIBLE table.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended or safe
customer_reviews.text: I always do shopping in advance. I Bought one of these for my 2 year olds birthday. It’s cheaply made and will not stay in place. my son went to sit down and slid off the seat. I can’t even exchange it for a new one because the return window closing. Do not recommend This company for toddler tables.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Galante

customer_reviews.title: OK ITEM
customer_reviews.text: The Little Tikes bench table I had before this one was much sturdier and larger. I was disappointed in this item, but my 2 year old grandson absolutely LOVES it! Because of that, I do recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: marysbl

customer_reviews.title: East to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Our table was very easy to assemble and my children use it ALL THE TIME. The only downfall is that the black piece underneath the table part doesn't always stay in the correct position; so the table top will sway back and forth a little until it's fixed each time. Not super sturdy unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Eating at Grandmas
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love their new table; they are two and three years old. It’s a small table but it’s perfect for their age!
customer_reviews.author: rick vian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, falls apart if kid likes to climb on ot
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: WAY smaller than you would expect!
customer_reviews.text: My mom had 2 little tykes tables for YEARS. (Like 20) but I need some for my grandkids now. This table is VERY small. 1 year olds and maybe 2 year olds could sit comfortably at it. No where near big enough for four 3 year olds and I have no idea how a 5 year old could sit comfortably. I returned both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Ludwinski

customer_reviews.title: Quite a bit smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This table is quite a bit smaller than I anticipated. I guess I didn’t think I needed to double check the measurements. Now I noticed that in the name it says junior table. That’s definitely true. I was hoping this child this table would be good for a while but small for my three-year-old
customer_reviews.author: S. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It’s a bit smaller than some I’ve seen, but works well for my 2 & 4 year olds. It’s strong enough to hold me if I want to sit with them & it’s easy to clean. Great table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The table we rec'd was four days late and very difficult to even partially assemble. Once it is partially assembled it was for us impossible to disassemble to send back. The brackets under the table top that provide stability to the table are extremely difficult to position correctly. One of them broke off and lacerated my finger in the process. Consequently the table cannot be put together period. Amazon thankfully refunded our money and this junk is going to the curb for trash pickup.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the toddlers to use in the backyard during the summer weather .. It is the right height for the younger ones and can fit up to 4. Like that it is easy to clean off . I have since bought the umbrella which is a must to keep the direct sun off of them
customer_reviews.author: lisa presley

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was so easy, folding ability is genius, and its so sturdy! My two year old loves coloring and playing Play Doh on it, wipes off easily when colored on and folds up nice after he's done! Couldn't ask for a better design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for 5yr olds too small but great table
customer_reviews.text: This table was very simple to place together. However if you have a 5yr old like me it won’t last long. He has to maneuver to get in to sit down but once he’s seated he barely fits. He loves this table tho and can move this table to any area of the home himself
customer_reviews.author: CustomerT

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this picnic table, I run a daycare , and have had little tikes in my daycare 30 years, they last but this lasted 2 months plastic under table to brace is cheap plastic, broke, so very sad, the older models are much better built!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids love it. Not the same sturdiness that our children' Little Tykes Table was back in the 80s. In fact that one lasted 20+ years. Hopefully, this one lasts half as long. Perfect for little ones for numerous tasks. A must have with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kids table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my 1yr old son and he has had it for a few years with no issues until one day he was standing on top of it and it collapsed. We kept it for a while longer because it was still useable it just had a bad lean.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to put together. Only complaint is that it is VERY narrow. Two kids have to sit at opposite ends (or on the same side) if eating of there is not room for a plate/bowl in front of them. Kind of makes it a ONE person table which isn't very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: J. McDole

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold away easy
customer_reviews.text: Except to be able to fold the table easy and put away but to fold up and put away you got to undo the tabs on the bottom. I thought my husband was going to break it before he got it back together. Sooo it's just going to stay up but it works perfectly other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rathbone

customer_reviews.title: May not get exactly what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The wrong item was sent to us, and was very cheaply made. We ordered the table that did not have an umbrella. However we were sent one with the hole in the center, but no actual umbrella. Very small, much smaller than the one we bought just a few years ago and thinner plastic all around.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott rosenberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, I think my kid will enjoy it more in a few months, so far we use it to put his toys on top of it :)
customer_reviews.author: Alegna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, probably won't last to long
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, not worth the price! It's cheap plastic, and much smaller then I thought it would be. Good enough for a toddler to draw, paint, and color on. Cleaning it was ok, not to bad. Assemble was super simple. I'd buy it again if it were much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Really tiny
customer_reviews.text: I have this for my two and four year old. It’s really small but they can fit on it. It’s very unsturdy. I have to put it back together daily.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Les

customer_reviews.title: warehouse deal dud
customer_reviews.text: Bought from warehouse deals, said package was damaged got this and the legs were covered in grass and mud, table & seat were used and dirty with grim. Never again sending back! Buy new!
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok, but wasn't good for my kid
customer_reviews.text: I returned. I bought it as a gift for my niece, but she kept falling off. It was a little slippery and because there is no where to lean on to, my niece just kept falling back. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter and she loves it! We have it on the deck and she will "have a picnic" or do her artwork using this cute little table. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: eagledress

customer_reviews.title: My little daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Buy’s for our little toddler. My daughter loves it and it enables us to each lunch outside in the patio now that we’re home, it was a really good by.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Boo. Broke in 3 months ! Get the table and chairs instead.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is only 20 months and 25 lbs. plastic is poor and the table collapsed. While I rate the table 1 star, I rate the brand 5 stars bc they’re so great with customer support
customer_reviews.author: k pete

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Two year old loves it. It’s in our living room for him to eat on and do crafts. Works well and is sturdy. He often plays with toys on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie072000

customer_reviews.title: Kids table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my grand kids. Was disappointing on the size of it. The picture of the kids are older then what can fit at the table and the ad even says up to around 4 years old. My 22 month old seems to big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was great. We purchased this one because we had such ...
customer_reviews.text: We had another version of this table years ago, it was great. We purchased this one because we had such a great experience with our old one. The way these tables are made has changed. The plastic is super flimsy. The brackets are too. This table wobbled almost immediately. Within a week both side of the backets had torn the plastic. We had to throw it away. So lame!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: I should have believed negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very flimsy construction, soft plastic. And also very small - up to 12 months I would say, my 18 months old is 25 lbs and it feels small fir him. Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.author: Maria Warkentin

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer; not strongly built
customer_reviews.text: I would otherwise give it a 5 if it lasted for a year! This did not even last 6 months! I have a 4 yo and a 2 yo and they use this for just about anything ; from eating to arts and crafts to just hanging out .. the plastic hooks that connects the table underneath are not very sturdy . It is not built for active usage . I’ll try to return but my return window ended a month after buying it . Money wasted here . I do not recommend this product if you have active toddlers .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy like all of the little tikes products.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little table for my 2 year old grandson. It is small enough for him to get his legs in and out of. It also doesn't take up a lot of room but is big enough for several children. Do keep in mind that it's pretty close to the ground for older kids. Probably won't want to order this size for anyone under 4 or 5 years old. It depends on how large the child is.
customer_reviews.author: C. Judy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kids love eating together so i figured buying this would be convenient for having it in the living room and i could also take it outside for midday lunch. Theres a hole in the middle for an umbrella as well. Easy setup as one two three. Handles my son and daughter. My daughter is 41 pounds and my son is 20.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe v

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for toddlers and preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: All six of my grandchildren love this picnic table. They use it for everything, and it is easily portable from one room to another. I highly recommend this to anyone with toddlers and preschoolers. And my children had one when they were small! They are in their thirties now, and using them for their children.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for my petite and growing 15 month old  grandchild
customer_reviews.text: My grand-baby is a petite 15 month old child and this table is perfect for her to start to use her coloring books, use her puzzles or have snack time with Ella her favorite stuffed toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son assembled this in just a few minutes. It’s sturdy and great quality. My 2 year old loves it. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sb1983Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to sit in
customer_reviews.text: Bought a similar table thirty years ago and it was great product then. My grandson who is 18 months is having a difficult time sitting at the table. The bench seat is to close to the tabletop and the option of "sliding" in is not possible. It is a lot like when you are sitting in a booth at a restaurant. Construct is great and I have purchased Little Tikes products when my kids were young and never had trouble with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Like It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Perfect for our little guy to eat snacks and do crafts on while we are on the patio. He did use chalk on it and took some elbow grease to get that off.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Leslie Keast

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this table and so does my daughter, she got this for her first birthday. She’s 16 months and uses it every day. She can sit on it herself. It’s very easy to assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 2 and 3 year old with plenty of room of growth. Quality seem very good and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Briozan

customer_reviews.title: 2 Yr. Old Love It
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the 18 month old (now 2) who sits at it and plays. (When he can be still...) Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in NH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed with this and had such high hopes being that it is made by Little Tikes. I got this for my 2 year old twins for Easter, we've had it for a little less than a week and the plastic tabs that are supposed to support the sides of the table are already staring to give and the table wobbles when my kids lean on it. I'm going to attempt to return this and buy something much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this little picnic table with umbrella. Just the right size for my granddaughter, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Jr sized, so smaller than in the store, but good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but perfect for our 3 year old and a friend. Easy to move from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was much simpler to put together than I expected. It took less than 2 minutes and my two year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy table.
customer_reviews.text: Love all Little Tyke items. They’re all so well made. The toddlers loved being able to sit at a table that is sized for them. This was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Donna MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 17MO. She loves it, eats at "her table" instead of any high chair or in our lap. It was pretty simple to put together. Instructions were easy, but you have to man-handle the legs into place. I saw the plastic being bent inward before it popped into place. But once together, it's light enough I can have kid in one hand, pick table up one handed. But still sturdy enough that our 8yo now sits at the table with the little one to eat sometimes, and it holds them both, no problem. And the 8yo is 90lbs
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN BREWER

customer_reviews.title: Great child’s picnic table!
customer_reviews.text: Great easy-to-store sturdy picnic table for small children! They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Offthucuff

customer_reviews.title: Easy store, clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this table, very versatile. Good outdoor play table, eat table and easy to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Irby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pre schooler to have his own little table. It was SO easy to assemble no tools needed it just clicked in place and its durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and kids like it
customer_reviews.text: This table is much smaller than expected and it does not fold for dtorage
customer_reviews.author: Ma Boda

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and loved it til it broke on day 14. How can a five and three year old break it?
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table, easy to put together! Little Tykes is a good product to invest in!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, missing umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The table was very shaky and didn't come with an umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Stuff for kids
customer_reviews.text: Little Tikes is legendary. Good quality and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: keith v

customer_reviews.title: Smaller table
customer_reviews.text: Same great Little Tykes quality... just smaller than I thought. Our 4yo grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stahr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love it ! Perfect size and very sturdy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: very small. Little tikes isn't the same quality/value it once was
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Beck

customer_reviews.title: it great customer services item receive on time and good material
customer_reviews.text: thank you item receive on time and as it look on the website thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Moraima

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Table
customer_reviews.text: Usually I like Little Tikes products. Not this one!! When assembled it's a flimsy table. Supports and plastic not heavy enough. Should have sent it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Leon ND

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: not a sturdy as I thought it would be. Not the Little Tikes quality I remember
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: A great website
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our grandchildren. They both love it.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE WESTBERRY

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for toddlers but parents you will not be able to sit with them on the table the proportions are too small
customer_reviews.author: Julie Renee Doering

customer_reviews.title: Talk about memories
customer_reviews.text: Many great times on this table from drawing to eating - great buy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Safe for great granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble . Pretty , safe for children and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Carroll  Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This table is easy to put together. It is a perfect fit for the 1 and 2 year olds at the daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Little Tikes Brand.  But this table won’t lock!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the table for my grandkids. Liked the fold up table but very difficult to snap to lock! I can’t even lock it with my arthritis (RA.) Is it possible if I return it. Do you have another folded table that is easy to lock? Linda Reis
customer_reviews.author: Italia54

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back, much smaller than expected. I should have done a better job reading the description, totally my fault.
customer_reviews.author: craig s

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: The picnic table I received is not the correct table the one side of table the little tikes label was upside down I called little tikes gave them the model number and they sent me a replacement leg well the leg they sent me was a lot bigger than the table you sent me so I went back to look at the one you sent me and it was a lot smaller than the one in the picture
customer_reviews.author: laura inshetski

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Name
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy picnic table for my little ones. They love it. Added to the collection of other Little Tikes outdoor play sets.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Way to small!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the size.. It's very small from what they use to be.. I wouldn't recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: angela throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: That it is safe for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My grand babies love be it. They are 2 and 3 years old and they feel like they’re like the older kids . Great size for them.
customer_reviews.author: Florina

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: This toddler table is great, not just for kids. My puppies love playing king of the hill!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to snap together but I think it's just me being weak over all I love it
customer_reviews.author: dana may

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his little play picknick table. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Tiny toddler table
customer_reviews.text: This little table is perfect for a small toddler, and very sturdy once it is together.. but it is pretty difficult to snap the benches in place to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great-grandkids, they love it. It is the perfect size and folds away easily for storage
customer_reviews.author: sandya

customer_reviews.title: That it arrived on time through the mail.
customer_reviews.text: My great grandson and daughter really likes this "Little Tikes Easy Store Jr. Play Table."
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 yo niece. She loves it. It is durable and easy to clean. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love that he fits so perfectly in his sit no problem getting in or out very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Very strong and durable. Easy to assemble. Use it all the time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DAN SCHULTZ

customer_reviews.title: fell apart too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for our church preschool class...both have broken down and had to be thrown away! =(
customer_reviews.author: lori jones

customer_reviews.title: Must have for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: 100% love this. My 2 year old was beginning to fight being in her high chair so I thought id look into toddler tables. So glad I found this! She hasn’t been in her high chair since we got this a few days ago. Great for her meals, snacks, play-doh, drawing...you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dodds

customer_reviews.title: No good!
customer_reviews.text: Product came missing the most vital piece to assemble the table. Ordered this item Dec 14 of last month and had to return for a replacement which I still have not received. At this point I’d rather just buy a different table.
customer_reviews.author: Omari D

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not like before
customer_reviews.text: Not as strongly made as I remember in the past. Not worth compromising a good product. However, it is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Penk

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Easy Store Jr. Play Table [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description:
Little Tikes easy store Jr. Play table easily opens for use and closes for storage. This picnic table is sized right for toddlers and a day full of indoor or outdoor activities.

kids can use this table as a picnic table, craft table, snack Table or game table; It sets up and folds down in a snap for storing. Wipe with a damp cloth to clean.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The fun never ends with Endless Adventures -- an exciting line of color coordinated products to complement any outdoor environment.
feature_bullets: Sized right for younger children, this indoor/outdoor table “unlocks” and folds for portability or storage
Center hole can hold an umbrella (not included)
No tools are required to set it up or take it down
Seats up to 4 children. Recommended age is 18 months to 5 years
Accessories not included; Made in USA

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
